attributes.action: DECLINE A CALL FOR A BLASPHEMY LAW
attributes.additional_details: Free speech has been an accepted quality of Great Britain for centuries and is a hard-fought right. We are allowed to criticise and examine beliefs and that is to be treasured. A law which protects any religion from criticism and examination is alien to our culture and is a step back.
attributes.background: Assure the people of this country that freedom of speech is not being eroded

rejection.details:
The Government have said that they are not going to introduce blasphemy laws:
https://hansard.parliament.uk/Commons/2024-12-18/debates/ba455fa1-fb15-4e1b-b4c9-884dfdaeb83e/CommonsChamber#contribution-83E4227E-B766-4980-9AFC-A77C90D20A59
